Breadth-First.Explanation: Introduction to broad clue-gathering without a specific hypothesis

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent hypothesis generation based on key collected clues

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from broad clue collection to forming and narrowing down a specific location hypothesis
